name: Bearfoot Bistro
description: Award-winning fine dining restaurant in Whistler Village featuring innovative Pacific Northwest cuisine. Known for its extensive wine cellar and unique dining experiences including sabering champagne bottles. The restaurant offers an elegant atmosphere perfect for special occasions and romantic dinners.
address: 4121 Village Green, Whistler, BC V0N 1B4, Canada
